verses.verse: ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho, Woe עֲטֶ֤רֶת <S%H5850><s%> 'a-Te-ret to the crown גֵּאוּת֙ <S%H1348><s%> ge-'Ut of pride שִׁכֹּרֵ֣י <S%H7910><s%> shik-ko-Rei to the drunkards אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim וְצִ֥יץ <S%H6731><s%> ve-Tzitz flower נֹבֵ֖ל <S%H5034><s%> no-Vel [is] a fading צְבִ֣י <S%H6643><s%> tze-Vi whose glorious תִפְאַרְתּ֑וֹ <S%H8597><s%> tif-'ar-To; beauty אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is at רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh which [are] on the head גֵּֽיא־ <S%H1516><s%> gei- valleys שְׁמָנִ֖ים <S%H8081><s%> she-ma-Nim of the fat הֲל֥וּמֵי <S%H1986><s%> ha-Lu-mei of them that are overcome יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin. with wine

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold חָזָ֤ק <S%H2389><s%> cha-Zak hath a mighty וְאַמִּץ֙ <S%H533><s%> ve-'am-Mitz and strong one לַֽאדֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> la-do-Nai, Behold the Lord כְּזֶ֥רֶם <S%H2230><s%> ke-Ze-rem [which] as a tempest בָּרָ֖ד <S%H1259><s%> ba-Rad of hail שַׂ֣עַר <S%H8178><s%> Sa-'ar storm קָ֑טֶב <S%H6986><s%> Ka-tev; [and] a destroying כְּ֠זֶרֶם <S%H2230><s%> Ke-ze-rem as a flood מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters כַּבִּירִ֥ים <S%H3524><s%> kab-bi-Rim of mighty שֹׁטְפִ֛ים <S%H7857><s%> sho-te-Fim overflowing הִנִּ֥יחַ <S%H3240><s%> hin-Ni-ach shall cast down לָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz to the earth בְּיָֽד׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad. with the hand

בְּרַגְלַ֖יִם <S%H7272><s%> be-rag-La-yim under feet תֵּֽרָמַ֑סְנָה <S%H7429><s%> te-ra-Mas-nah; shall be trodden עֲטֶ֥רֶת <S%H5850><s%> 'a-Te-ret The crown גֵּא֖וּת <S%H1348><s%> ge-'Ut of pride שִׁכּוֹרֵ֥י <S%H7910><s%> shik-ko-Rei the drunkards אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim. of Ephraim

וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-ye-Tah become צִיצַ֤ת <S%H6733><s%> tzi-Tzat flower נֹבֵל֙ <S%H5034><s%> no-Vel shall be a fading צְבִ֣י <S%H6643><s%> tze-Vi And the glorious תִפְאַרְתּ֔וֹ <S%H8597><s%> tif-'ar-To, beauty אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is at רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh which [is] on the head גֵּ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> gei valley שְׁמָנִ֑ים <S%H8081><s%> she-ma-Nim; of the fat כְּבִכּוּרָהּ֙ <S%H1061><s%> ke-vik-ku-Rah [and] as the hasty fruit בְּטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> be-Te-rem prior קַ֔יִץ <S%H7019><s%> Ka-yitz, before the summer אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Which יִרְאֶ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh which [when] he that looketh הָֽרֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> ha-ro-'Eh upon it seeth אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah, בְּעוֹדָ֥הּ <S%H5750><s%> be-'o-Dah soon בְּכַפּ֖וֹ <S%H3709><s%> be-chap-Po while it is yet in his hand יִבְלָעֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H1104><s%> yiv-la-'En-nah. he eateth it up ס sa-Mek

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh will become יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh shall the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts לַעֲטֶ֣רֶת <S%H5850><s%> la-'a-Te-ret be for a crown צְבִ֔י <S%H6643><s%> tze-Vi, of glory וְלִצְפִירַ֖ת <S%H6843><s%> ve-litz-fi-Rat and for a diadem תִּפְאָרָ֑ה <S%H8597><s%> tif-'a-Rah; of beauty לִשְׁאָ֖ר <S%H7605><s%> lish-'Ar unto the residue עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo. of his people

וּלְר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> u-le-Ru-ach And for a spirit מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat; of judgment לַיּוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> lai-yo-Shev to him that sitteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in הַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-Pat, in judgment וְלִ֨גְבוּרָ֔ה <S%H1369><s%> ve-Lig-vu-Rah, and for strength מְשִׁיבֵ֥י <S%H7725><s%> me-shi-Vei to them that turn מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah the battle שָֽׁעְרָה׃ <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'e-rah. to the gate ס sa-Mek

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- also אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> 'el-leh But they בַּיַּ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> bai-Ya-yin through wine שָׁג֔וּ <S%H7686><s%> sha-Gu, also have erred וּבַשֵּׁכָ֖ר <S%H7941><s%> u-vash-she-Char and through strong drink תָּע֑וּ <S%H8582><s%> ta-'U; are out of the way כֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> ko-Hen the priest וְנָבִיא֩ <S%H5030><s%> ve-na-Vi and the prophet שָׁג֨וּ <S%H7686><s%> sha-Gu have erred בַשֵּׁכָ֜ר <S%H7941><s%> vash-she-Char through strong drink נִבְלְע֣וּ <S%H1104><s%> niv-le-'U they are swallowed up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- of הַיַּ֗יִן <S%H3196><s%> hai-Ya-yin, wine תָּעוּ֙ <S%H8582><s%> ta-'U they are out of the way מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- with הַשֵּׁכָ֔ר <S%H7941><s%> hash-she-Char, through strong drink שָׁגוּ֙ <S%H7686><s%> sha-Gu they err בָּֽרֹאֶ֔ה <S%H7203><s%> ba-ro-'Eh, in vision פָּק֖וּ <S%H6328><s%> pa-Ku they stumble פְּלִילִיָּֽה׃ <S%H6417><s%> pe-li-li-Yah. [in] judgment

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for all שֻׁלְחָנ֔וֹת <S%H7979><s%> shul-cha-Not, For all tables מָלְא֖וּ <S%H4390><s%> mal-'U are full קִ֣יא <S%H6892><s%> ki of vomit צֹאָ֑ה <S%H6675><s%> tzo-'Ah; [and] filthiness בְּלִ֖י <S%H1097><s%> be-Li without מָקֽוֹם׃ <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom. [so that there is] no place ס sa-Mek

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> mi to whom יוֹרֶ֣ה <S%H3384><s%> yo-Reh Whom shall he teach דֵעָ֔ה <S%H1844><s%> de-'Ah, knowledge וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> mi whom יָבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> ya-Vin interpret שְׁמוּעָ֑ה <S%H8052><s%> she-mu-'Ah; bruit גְּמוּלֵי֙ <S%H1580><s%> ge-mu-Lei from מֵֽחָלָ֔ב <S%H2461><s%> me-cha-Lav, from the milk עַתִּיקֵ֖י <S%H6267><s%> 'at-ti-Kei [and] drawn מִשָּׁדָֽיִם׃ <S%H7699><s%> mish-sha-Da-yim. from the breasts

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For צַ֤ו <S%H6673><s%> tzav For precept לָצָו֙ <S%H6673><s%> la-Tzav [must be] upon precept צַ֣ו <S%H6673><s%> tzav precept לָצָ֔ו <S%H6673><s%> la-Tzav, upon precept קַ֥ו <S%H6957><s%> kav line לָקָ֖ו <S%H6957><s%> la-Kav upon line קַ֣ו <S%H6957><s%> kav line לָקָ֑ו <S%H6957><s%> la-Kav; upon line זְעֵ֥יר <S%H2191><s%> ze-'Eir here a little שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham here זְעֵ֥יר <S%H2191><s%> ze-'Eir [and] there a little שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. here

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki Indeed בְּלַעֲגֵ֣י <S%H3934><s%> be-la-'a-Gei For with stammering שָׂפָ֔ה <S%H8193><s%> sa-Fah, lips וּבְלָשׁ֖וֹן <S%H3956><s%> u-ve-la-Shon tongue אַחֶ֑רֶת <S%H312><s%> 'a-Che-ret; and another יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber will he speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am to this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this

אֲשֶׁ֣ר׀ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar To whom he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, about זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הַמְּנוּחָה֙ <S%H4496><s%> ham-me-nu-Chah This [is] the rest הָנִ֣יחוּ <S%H5117><s%> ha-Ni-chu to rest לֶֽעָיֵ֔ף <S%H5889><s%> le-'a-Yef, [wherewith] ye may cause the weary וְזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> ve-Zot likewise הַמַּרְגֵּעָ֑ה <S%H4774><s%> ham-mar-ge-'Ah; and this [is] the refreshing וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אָב֖וּא <S%H14><s%> 'a-Vu yet they would שְׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> she-Mo-a'. not hear

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become לָהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- But the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD צַ֣ו <S%H6673><s%> tzav was unto them precept לָצָ֞ו <S%H6673><s%> la-Tzav upon precept צַ֤ו <S%H6673><s%> tzav precept לָצָו֙ <S%H6673><s%> la-Tzav upon precept קַ֤ו <S%H6957><s%> kav line לָקָו֙ <S%H6957><s%> la-Kav upon line קַ֣ו <S%H6957><s%> kav line לָקָ֔ו <S%H6957><s%> la-Kav, upon line זְעֵ֥יר <S%H2191><s%> ze-'Eir here a little שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham here זְעֵ֣יר <S%H2191><s%> ze-'Eir [and] there a little שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of יֵלְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chu may go וְכָשְׁל֤וּ <S%H3782><s%> ve-cha-she-Lu and fall אָחוֹר֙ <S%H268><s%> 'a-chOr backward וְנִשְׁבָּ֔רוּ <S%H7665><s%> ve-nish-Ba-ru, and be broken וְנוֹקְשׁ֖וּ <S%H3369><s%> ve-nok-Shu and snared וְנִלְכָּֽדוּ׃ <S%H3920><s%> ve-nil-Ka-du. and taken פ Peh

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Wherefore hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei you לָצ֑וֹן <S%H3944><s%> la-Tzon; ye scornful מֹֽשְׁלֵי֙ <S%H4910><s%> mo-she-Lei that rule הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. which [is] in Jerusalem

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because אֲמַרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H559><s%> 'a-mar-Tem, Because ye have said כָּרַ֤תְנֽוּ <S%H3772><s%> ka-Rat-nu We have made בְרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> ve-Rit a covenant אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with מָ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> Ma-vet, with death וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im- and with שְׁא֖וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol and with hell עָשִׂ֣ינוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-nu are we חֹזֶ֑ה <S%H2374><s%> cho-Zeh; at agreement; שִׁיט shit כשֹׁ֣וט <S%H7885><s%> Shot oar קשׁוֹטֵ֤ף <S%H7752><s%> sho-Tef scourge כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when; עָבַר 'a-var כיַֽעֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-Vor alienate קלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not יְבוֹאֵ֔נוּ <S%H935><s%> ye-vo-'E-nu, it shall not come כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki when שַׂ֧מְנוּ <S%H7760><s%> Sam-nu unto us for we have made כָזָ֛ב <S%H3577><s%> cha-Zav lies מַחְסֵ֖נוּ <S%H4268><s%> mach-Se-nu our refuge וּבַשֶּׁ֥קֶר <S%H8267><s%> u-vash-She-ker and under falsehood נִסְתָּֽרְנוּ׃ <S%H5641><s%> nis-Ta-re-nu. have we hid ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֛י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold יִסַּ֥ד <S%H3245><s%> yis-Sad Behold I lay בְּצִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> be-tzi-Yon in Zion אָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'A-ven; for a foundation a stone אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven stone בֹּ֜חַן <S%H976><s%> Bo-chan a tried פִּנַּ֤ת <S%H6438><s%> pin-Nat corner יִקְרַת֙ <S%H3368><s%> yik-Rat a precious מוּסָ֣ד <S%H4143><s%> mu-Sad foundation מוּסָּ֔ד <S%H3245><s%> mus-Sad, [stone] a sure הַֽמַּאֲמִ֖ין <S%H539><s%> ham-ma-'a-Min he that believeth לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo before יָחִֽישׁ׃ <S%H2363><s%> ya-Chish. shall not make haste

וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti also will I lay מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat Judgment לְקָ֔ו <S%H6957><s%> le-Kav, to the line וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> u-tze-da-Kah and righteousness לְמִשְׁקָ֑לֶת <S%H4949><s%> le-mish-Ka-let; to the plummet וְיָעָ֤ה <S%H3261><s%> ve-ya-'Ah shall sweep away בָרָד֙ <S%H1259><s%> va-Rad and the hail מַחְסֵ֣ה <S%H4268><s%> mach-Seh the refuge כָזָ֔ב <S%H3577><s%> cha-Zav, of lies וְסֵ֥תֶר <S%H5643><s%> ve-Se-ter the hiding place מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim and the waters יִשְׁטֹֽפוּ׃ <S%H7857><s%> yish-To-fu. shall overflow
